You are hereSSU Home › Academics ›  
Schedule of Classes






Looking for Winter or Summer Intersession? Check the School of Extended Education for classes and enrollment information.
Fall 2023 Classes
Login to the SSU Portal and MySSU to access the searchable schedule of classes. The schedule in MySSU is the most current schedule and is kept up to date as sections are changed.
For those who are unable to use the searchable schedule, please refer to the following PDF and Word documents for Fall 2023 course offerings. Publication date: April 3, 2023. These documents are not kept current.
Fall 2023 Schedule of Classes  (PDF) (Word doc)
General Education Classes  (PDF) (Word doc)
Cross-Listed Classes  (PDF) (Word doc)
